column4: hi folks please help! When I start my ubuntu I am getting the grub prompt only? I am on a dual boot machine, What do I do? Please help :(
well. you will basically need to tell grub on which drive your kernel is and what initrd image to use
: How do I find it out?
: Earlier everything was perfect, don't know what cause this grub thing :(
caused*
likely you either reinstalled windows or updated ubuntu
No, I did nothing like that, as far as I remember
but anyway, is there any way to restore?
doesnt really matter though. https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows
the livecd way is probably easiest
: My CD drive doesn't work :(
well no worries
did you install your ubuntu from the windows installer?
: I installed via WUBI
well that complicates shit
oh :(
: Currently I have a ubuntu 10 installed as main OS, over it I have windows 7 and over windows 7 I have ubuntu 11(wubi)
so which grub doesnt work anymoer?
: the ubuntu 11 one
give this a try: http://www.omaregan.com/?p=608
:trying this: Restarting my system brb
: that didn't help :'(
